QuestData.Title: The Night Watch
QuestData.Description: I'm afraid you're all I've got to help here, $n. Stormwind's forces are so taxed by greater evils that they can't spare a single footman to protect Darkshire. It's up to me and the rest of the Night Watch to keep our homes safe.$B$BThere's more threats here than just wolves, unfortunately. Rotting horrors roam near Blind Mary's Haunt, on the southeast outskirts. If they're not kept in check, they'll be visiting our homes in the night.$B$BDeal with the undead and report back to me for your bounty.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Rotting Horrors near Blind Mary's Haunt, southeast of Darkshire.
QuestData.RewardText: Splendid, $n. For your service to the people of Darkshire you shall be rewarded.
